study_tag.description: A unique free-text label for each genome-wide association study in the publication

genotyping_technology.description: The method used to genotype variants in the discovery stage

array_manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the genotyping array used for the discovery stage

array_information.description: Additional information about the genotyping array

imputation.description: Were SNPs imputed for the discovery GWAS?

variant_count.description: The number of variants analysed in the discovery stage (after QC)

statistical_model.description: Details of the statistical model used to determine association significance

background_trait.description: Any background trait(s) shared by all individuals in the GWAS (e.g. in both cases and controls)

background_efo_trait.description: EFOs that best match entered “background trait”

summary_statistics_file.description: An identifier for the file containing full summary statistics for this study (if available)

summary_statistics_assembly.description: Genome assembly of the summary statitistics
